channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: DeepSeek A.I. Is a Win for China, but a Danger to Party Control
item.description: DeepSeek’s success embodies China’s ambitions in artificial intelligence. But it could also threaten the grip on power the nation’s leaders hold.

item.title: An ‘aerial version of Moore’s Law’ has dramatically improved safety, but an aviation expert notes this disturbing trend
item.description: From 2018 to 2022, the risk of a fatality from commercial air travel was 1 per 13.7 million passenger boardings versus 1 per 7.9 million from 2008 to ...

item.title: F.A.A.’s Main Warning System for Pilots Is Down, U.S. Official Says
item.description: Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy said the Federal Aviation Administration was using a backup system while it worked to address the problem.

item.title: The Divine, the Digital and the Political at Humanity’s Largest Gathering
item.description: The Maha Kumbh Mela, a Hindu festival in India that is drawing hundreds of millions of pilgrims, is a powerful marketing tool for Prime Minister Naren...

item.title: DeepSeek A.I. Is a Win for China, but a Danger to Party Control
item.description: DeepSeek’s success embodies China’s ambitions in artificial intelligence. But it could also threaten the grip on power the nation’s leaders hold.

item.title: Some FAA systems are a half-century old, as aging tech suffers from lack of replacement parts and support service
item.description: A 2024 GAO report found that 37% of the FAA's 138 air traffic control systems were deemed unsustainable.

item.title: F.A.A.’s Main Warning System for Pilots Is Down, U.S. Official Says
item.description: Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy said the Federal Aviation Administration was using a backup system while it worked to address the problem.

item.title: The Divine, the Digital and the Political at Humanity’s Largest Gathering
item.description: The Maha Kumbh Mela, a Hindu festival in India that is drawing hundreds of millions of pilgrims, is a powerful marketing tool for Prime Minister Naren...

item.title: Health Programs Shutter Around the World After Trump Pauses Foreign Aid
item.description: Lifesaving treatment and prevention programs for tuberculosis, malaria, H.I.V. and other diseases cannot access funds to continue work.

item.title: Trump slaps tariffs on top US trade partners—with risk of hikes if there’s retaliation—and there will be no exemptions
item.description: The tariffs will go into effect on Tuesday.

item.title: Israel and Hamas Exchange 3 Hostages and More Than 180 Prisoners
item.description: In highly staged ceremonies, Hamas freed three people held captive over the last 15 months. Keeping to its part of the cease-fire deal, Israel release...

item.title: Elon Musk’s DOGE gains access to sensitive Treasury data, including Social Security and Medicare payment systems
item.description: The move by DOGE means it could have wide leeway to access important taxpayer data, among other things.

item.title: How US Tariffs Challenge China
item.description: China chose swift retaliation for trade measures in the first Trump administration, but that led to an upward spiral of trade measures and much broade...

item.title: It’s not just forgetfulness: 8 early warning signs of dementia
item.description: Nightmares and changes in vision can both be early warning signs of dementia.

item.title: “I Feel Like a Superhero.” Hope Lives Amid Gaza’s Rubble.
item.description: Amid the devastation of Gaza, we now can at least look for some purpose beyond mere survival.
